#summary Installing ffead-server

= Dependencies = 
<font size="3" face="Georgia, Arial">
  * Download the tar file and extract it to the location of your choice.
  * Make sure boost libraries are installed on your system
  * Install Unix-ODBC and required odbc files for MySQL dependency
  * Install Open-SSL as well
  * Go to the ffead-server/Release or ffead-server/Debug depending on whether you need to debug the server code
  * Open terminal and type *make all*
  * This will create the distribution folder named ffead-server inside ffead-server/Release or ffead-server/Debug folders accordingly
  * Place your application shared library inside the ffead-server/Release/ffead-server or ffead-server/Debug/ffead-server folder.
  * Place your web application specific files inside the ffead-server/Release/ffead-server/web folder inside a folder with your application name
  * Type *./server.sh* when inside the ffead-server folder to start the application server
  * A default application is already provided for your reference inside the ffead-server/web folder
</font>
